clearLines: Clear lines by filling rows completely
scoreIncreases: Score increases with each line cleared
levelUp: Level up every 10 lines (game speeds up)
gameOverCondition: Game over when pieces stack to the top
connectWallet: Connect wallet to record scores on-chain
fairSeed: Each game gets a provably fair seed
submitScores: Submit scores to earn TETRI tokens
soloDesc: CHALLENGE YOURSELF AND TOP THE LEADERBOARDS
multiplayerDesc: COMING SOON - PLAY ONLINE WITH FRIENDS
customizationDesc: UNLOCK AND CLAIM BLOCK SKINS AS NFTS
marketplaceDesc: TRADE SKIN NFTS WITH OTHER PLAYERS
walletRequiredText: You must connect your wallet to play TetriChain
connectWalletToViewProfile: Connect wallet to view your profile
title: TETRIS ON-CHAIN
howToPlayContent: Use the arrow keys to move and rotate the tetriminos. Complete lines to score points. The game ends when the blocks stack up to the top.
noScoresYet: No scores yet. Be the first!
gameSeedCreated: Game seed created! Your game is provably fair.
failedToCreateGameSeed: Failed to create game seed. Please try again.
noBlockchainGameSeed: No blockchain game seed. Connect wallet and start a new game.
scoreSubmitted: Score submitted! You earned {{tokens}} TETRI tokens!
failedToSubmitScore: Failed to submit score to blockchain.
skinClaimed: {{skinName}} claimed as NFT! Check your wallet.
multiplayerComingSoon: Multiplayer coming soon! Stay tuned for epic battles.
couldNotFindNFT: Could not find NFT for {{skinName}} in your wallet. Make sure you claimed it as an NFT.
beFirstToList: Be the first to list a skin NFT!
selectNFTToSell: Select which NFT you want to sell:
noClaimedNFTs: You don't have any claimed NFTs yet. Claim skins in the Customization menu first!
enterPriceInTetri: Enter the price in TETRI tokens:
